Name: Tailor Made
Ingredients: 5 ml Honey syrup (3 parts honey to 1 water by weight)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of grapefruit zest twist.
EXPRESS grapefruit zest twist over cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Bourbon-laced cranberry and grapefruit with light honeyed richness and a faint touch of clove spice.
History: Adapted from a recipe created by Dale DeGroff in New York City, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Tailor Made contains 171 calories
